# NetworkServerWorld.AddPlayer method

Add an player to the server world

```csharp
public void AddPlayer(short clientId, string resourcePath, string[] scriptPaths)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| clientId | The id of the new client |
| resourcePath | The resource path (.res) to the scene package |
| scriptPaths | The script paths used by the scene |
